---
title: "Publications"
---

```{r init, echo=FALSE}
library("RefManageR")
papers <- ReadBib("papers.bib", .Encoding = "UTF-8")
chapters <- ReadBib("chapters.bib", .Encoding = "UTF-8")
```

<h3>Peer-reviewed journal articles</h3>

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
NoCite(papers)
PrintBibliography(papers, .opts = list(style = "html", bib.style = "authoryear", sorting = "ydnt"))
```

<h3>Book chapters</h3>

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
NoCite(chapters)
PrintBibliography(chapters, .opts = list(style = "html", bib.style = "authoryear", sorting = "ydnt"))
```
